name: FreeCell ‑ Classic
description:
Play the BEST FreeCell Solitaire game on your iPhone/iPad now. FreeCell has a fresh new look, it is one of the most popular card games included the Windows, and is now available for free for your Apple device! Play FreeCell that require skill, strategy and patience to win! A true brain training experience!

FreeCell Solitaire adds a new element of strategy to the classic solitaire games Klondike. After dealing from a standard deck of 52 cards, use the four free cell spots as placeholders as you try to move all of the cards from the Tableau for a win. Just like Klondike solitaire games, you must move cards from the Tableau to the Foundation cells by suit, in ascending order. Most FreeCell games can be solved, if you can find the right strategy.

You've played FreeCell solitaire on your computer before, and now you can play FreeCell free, anywhere at any time of the day! You won't want to play any other FreeCell game again!

RULES:
Moving cards array count should less or equal to (free cell count + 1)*2^(empty tableau count) except the tableau that you wan to moving the cards in.

KEY FEATURES:
- Classic FreeCell
- 1 FreeCell, hardest level, 16.8%
- 2 FreeCell, difficulty level, 66.6%
- 3 FreeCell 91.9%

FreeCell solitaire has never been more fun! Any questions, please give us feedback. Azhuona@gmail.com
